.. :changelog:

History
-------

0.2.0 (2025-10-22)
++++++++++++++++++

**New Features:**

* spectra of galaxies can now be saved
* cleanup of precomputed filters
* verbosity can be passed as an argument
* phyiscal size and angular size in arcsec can be saved

**Bug Fixes:**

* various minor bug fixes and improvements.

**Other Changes:**

* updated documentation

0.1.0 (2024-12-13)
++++++++++++++++++

* First release on PyPI.
